破砕: (はさい) - crushing; smashing; cracking to pieces
破砕性爆弾: (はさいせいばくだん) - daisy cutter bomb
破竹の勢い: (はちくのいきおい) - with great vigour (from the way splitting bamboo goes all down the stick)
破籠: (わりご) - partitioned lidded wooden lunchbox; food served in such a box
破約: (はやく) - breach of contract; breaking of word
破綻を来す: (はたんをきたす) - to be ruined; to fail; to go bankrupt
破落戸: (ゴロツキ) - rogue; thug; hoodlum; punk; racketeer
破調: (はちょう) - out of tune; (poetic) broken meter
破邪顕正: (はじゃけんしょう) - (sense of) crushing evil and spreading the truth
破鍋に綴蓋: (われなべにとじぶた) - (proverb) there is a suitable spouse for everyone; every Jack has his Jill; a mended lid for a cracked pot
破鏡: (はきょう) - broken mirror; marital separation; divorce
破題: (はだい) - opening section of a Chinese poem or essay (in which the topic is broached); broaching the topic of a poem or essay in its opening lines
破顔一笑: (はがんいっしょう) - (yoji) smiling broadly
破顔大笑: (はがんたいしょう) - (yoji) breaking into a hearty laugh
破魔弓: (はまゆみ) - (ceremonial) bow used to drive off evil; toy bow and arrow
破魔矢: (はまや) - (ceremonial) arrow used to drive off evil

硝子球: (ガラスだま) - glass sphere; glass bead; glass marble
硝子軟骨: (しょうしなんこつ) - {anat} hyaline cartilage

硝煙弾雨: (しょうえんだんう) - (yoji) smoke of powder and hail of bullets; (in) the thick of the raging battle
